subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In the confusion of the game’s final nine seconds Sunday, Ryan Longwell, the Vikings’ veteran kicker, found himself iced three times — twice by the Giants and once by his own coach, Brad Childress.
snippet: In the confusion of the game’s final nine seconds Sunday, Ryan Longwell, the Vikings’ veteran kicker, found himself iced three times — twice by the Giants and once by his own coach, Brad Childress.
